bibles.title: Saamia 2010 Edition
bibles.title_vernacular: EBBAIBBO EMBOOSI YA NASAAE EYIRIMO EBITABO BILAANGWA

resources.tt: LLL 1: Ohuchaka nende Nyasaye [Look, Listen & Live 1 Beginning with GOD]
LLL 2:Abasacha Abasiikwa Abanyasaye [Look, Listen & Live 2 Mighty Men of GOD]
LLL 3: Ovuhiiri Ohuvitiraa Munyasaye [Look, Listen & Live 3 Victory through GOD]
LLL 4: Abakholi ba Omwami [Look, Listen & Live 4 Servants of GOD]
LLL 5: Ohutemwaa Hulwaa Nyasaye [Look, Listen & Live 5 On Trial for GOD]
LLL 6: Yesu - Omusomesia Mani Omuresi [Look, Listen & Live 6 JESUS - Teacher & Healer]
LLL 7: Yesu - Omwami Mani Omwonia [Look, Listen & Live 7 JESUS - Lord & Saviour]
LLL 8: Ebokhole bia Roho Mtakatifu [Look, Listen & Live 8 Acts of the HOLY SPIRIT]
